title: Effective Learning Strategies Utilizing Eye-Tracking Technology in Online Lectures for K-12 Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and initial online learning experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-Based Microlearning Environment Optimized for Language Learning Domains, Applying Visual Attention Techniques Using Eye-Tracking Technology

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operational principles of eye-tracking technology (visible cursor) in online lecture videos
Learners apply at least three strategies to focus on core learning elements in lectures utilizing eye-tracking technology
Learners can comparatively explain the differences between lectures with eye-tracking technology and conventional lectures
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
